/circle6 It is not possible to predict which babies will require resuscitation. It is, therefore, 
important to be prepared to resuscitate every newborn.
/circle6 Resuscitation must be anticipated at each birth. Up to half of newborns who require 
resuscitation have no identifi able risk factors before birth. An increased risk of breathing 
problems may occur in babies who are: 
/lozenge6 Pre-term
/lozenge6 Born aft  er a long
